drupalNodeEvent.title: Investment Screening and Supply Chain Security: Japanese, EU, and U.S. Perspectives on China

field_speakers.processed: Sarah Bauerle-Danzman (Indiana University Bloomington), Sophie Meunier Aitsahalia (Princeton University), Kristin Vekasi (University of Maine), Moderator: Christina L. Davis (Harvard University)

field_organizers.processed: Harvard University Fairbank Center For Chinese Studies

field_description.processed: This seminar is part of the Special Series on Japanese Economic Statecraft. Co-sponsored by the Fairbank Center for Chinese Studies, Harvard University; the Mossavar-Rahmani Center for Business and Government, Harvard Kennedy School; and the Minda de Gunzburg Center for European Studies, Harvard University.
